file_content.text: Captain. It's good to see you back--it was a mess out there.
Dorne and I almost didn't make it--I'd be dead if not for her. And now she's paying for it.
She wouldn't take no for an answer. Had to patch me up, even under heavy fire. She took a lot of hits out there.
What is Dorne's status now?
Will she be alright?
Dorne's too damn brave for her own good.
What was she thinking?
Elara isn't my favorite person in the galaxy, but she should get a medal for this.
It sounds like you took a few hits yourself--are you alright?
What about you?
I'll be fine, thanks to her.
How did the Imps manage to surprise you like that?
I want an explanation!
They didn't surprise us at all. We knew they were coming, but we couldn't pull out without that data from the bridge computers.
Yuun and I managed to take care of the worst of her wounds--she'll pull through. But it was a close call.
Make sure she's stable and keep me updated.
Keep an eye on her.
Will do.
The important thing is that you both got out of there. I'm proud of you.
You did well, Jorgan.
I don't think she would've left me behind if I'd shot her myself--and I wasn't about to let that ex-Imp upstage me.
You two should've kept better control of the situation.
Too close for my tastes.
I fought harder out there than I've ever fought in my life, and so did she! If you want more than that, then get used to being disappointed.
Yeah, yeah. It's all my fault. Maybe one of these days you'll slip up and forget you hate me.
You two want to talk about this later? We're sitting on a superweapon that's strapped to blow.
Double-time it, people! We're getting out of here!
Agreed.
Let's get this ship moving and finish this.
The mission is almost over.
Agreed! Let the Empire remember why they fear the heroes of Havoc Squad!
No one's dead yet. Let's finish what we came here to do.
Everyone get a grip!
Agreed--our heroic task is all but accomplished. Let the Imperials quake at the strength of democracy!
Yuun will see that the ship is prepared for launch. Once we are clear of the Gauntlet, we can contact General Garza with a situation report.
